title: Add female voice narration and enhanced visuals to boot sequence

requirements.summary: Add female text-to-speech voice narration to the boot sequence that speaks the provided script with synchronization to boot stages
acceptanceCriteria: Female voice plays automatically during boot sequence
Voice narration matches the provided script exactly
Voice playback is synchronized with boot sequence stages
Voice respects the existing voiceEnabled setting from infoSettingsState

file_operations.description: Integrate female text-to-speech voice narration into the boot sequence. Add speech synthesis using the Web Speech API with a female voice, speaking the script: 'Hello welcome to the H.E.V mark prototype protective systems. Initialization procedures active. Comms. Active. Advanced medical systems. Active. Advanced weaponry systems engaged. Vital signs Activated. Tactical engagement systems Activated. Environmental hazard and informational tabs Activated. Power and health monitoring systems Activated. Boot up sequence finished. Have a very safe day.' Synchronize voice playback with the existing boot stage animations. Gate voice playback on the voiceEnabled setting from infoSettingsState. Handle voice initialization, utterance queueing, and cleanup on component unmount.

Add a helper function to support speech synthesis voice playback with voice selection preference for female voices. Implement voice initialization that respects the existing voiceEnabled setting and integrates with the audio unlock flow. Provide an interface for queuing and controlling speech utterances that can be used by boot sequence and other components.

requirements.summary: Enhance the boot sequence visuals to display system initialization stages with status indicators, progress bars, and animated elements synchronized with voice announcements
acceptanceCriteria: Boot sequence displays distinct visual stages for each system initialization step
Visual elements animate smoothly and provide clear feedback about initialization progress
Visuals are synchronized with voice narration timing
Enhanced visuals maintain consistency with existing HUD aesthetic and color scheme
Boot sequence remains performant and does not cause layout shifts or visual glitches

file_operations.description: Enhance the boot sequence with informative and visually engaging system initialization stages. Add distinct visual stages for each system mentioned in the voice script: Initialization, Comms, Advanced Medical, Weaponry, Vital Signs, Tactical Engagement, Environmental/Informational tabs, and Power/Health Monitoring. Implement animated status indicators (checkmarks, progress bars, or pulse effects) for each stage that animate in as the corresponding voice line plays. Use the existing HUD color scheme from CSS variables and maintain consistency with the current HEV aesthetic. Add progress percentage display. Ensure animations respect the prefers-reduced-motion media query. Synchronize visual stage transitions with voice narration timing using the same timing logic. Maintain smooth fade-out and completion callback behavior.
